title: Taylor Polynomial with Table part - c

content.description: Let h be a function having derivatives of all orders for x > 0. Selected values of h and its first four derivatives are indicated in the table above. The function h and these four derivative are increasing on the interval 1 ≤ x ≤ 3.
content.question: Use the Lagrange error bound to show that the third-degree polynomial for h about x = 2 approximates h(1.9) with error less than 3 ⨯10-4.

frqParts.text: Use the Lagrange error bound to show that the third-degree polynomial for h about x = 2 approximates h(1.9) with error less than 3 ⨯10-4.

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
